meanings.definition: Move or travel toward or into a place.
meanings.sent1: I will come to the park with you.
meanings.sent2: The bus will come at 9 o'clock.
meanings.sent3: The cat will come to the kitchen for food.
meanings.sent4: The sun will come over the horizon in the morning.
meanings.sent5: Come to the party and have fun with us.

meanings.sent1: We will come to the beach for a picnic.
meanings.sent3: The idea will come to me in the shower.
meanings.sent4: The truth will come out eventually.
meanings.sent5: Come to the meeting on time for important information.

meanings.definition: Reach a particular state or condition.
meanings.sent1: The cake will come out of the oven golden brown.
meanings.sent2: The flowers will come into full bloom in spring.
meanings.sent3: The answer will come to you when you least expect it.
meanings.sent4: The truth will come to light eventually.
meanings.sent5: Come to understand the importance of kindness.

meanings.sent2: The meeting will come after lunch.
meanings.sent3: The idea will come to fruition with hard work.
meanings.sent4: The truth will come out eventually.
meanings.sent5: Come what may, we will face it together.

meanings.sent1: The message will come through clearly.
meanings.sent2: The instructions will come with the package.
meanings.sent3: The concept will come to you with practice.
meanings.sent4: The truth will come to be known by all.
meanings.sent5: Come to realize the importance of communication.
